creator: sandeep.kumar@induslogic.com
text:
hi ,

I am receving this exception when i increase the thread and iteration.

Where could be the issue . How to get rid of this issue . 
I tried editing the JMeter.bat file ,but it does not help .

set HEAP=-Xms256m -Xmx1024m 
set SURVIVOR=-XX:SurvivorRatio=8 -XX:TargetSurvivorRatio=80%

Regards
sandeep

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Need more information. Please can you attach:

* the rest of the stack trace
* the test plan (remove any passwords etc first)
* jmeter.properties
* jmeter.log
* contents of console output if any

Plus details of what you were doing when the error occured - e.g. were you
opening a particular listener, or changing between listeners etc?
No=one else is reporting this, so I assume it has been fixed
creator: sebb@apache.org
